com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.statemachine.actions

Class StateMachineActionsAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.statemachine.actions.StateMachineActionsAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class StateMachineActionsAutoConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Spring auto configuration to provide beans for all available actions within the Agent job execution state machine.
    Since:
    4.0.0
